
Kondhala is a village in the Gadchiroli district  with an area of 1671.7 hectares, harbouring 974 households and with total population of 3873 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town is DESAIGANJ at a distance of 5-10 kms. 
            
== Educational facilities ==

There are 5 Pre-primary schools in the village
There are 4 Primary schools in the village
There are 2 Middle schools in the village
There are 1 Secondary schools in the village
The nearest Senior secondary schools is at a distance of < 5 km from the village.
The nearest Degree colleges of arts  science & commerce is at a distance of 5-10 kms from the village.
The nearest Engineering colleges is at a distance of > 10 km from the village.
The nearest Medical colleges is at a distance of > 10 km from the village.
The nearest Management institutes is at a distance of > 10 km from the village.
The nearest Polytechnics is at a distance of > 10 km from the village.
The nearest Vocational training schools is at a distance of > 10 km from the village.
The nearest Non-formal training centres is at a distance of > 10 km from the village.
The nearest special schools for the disabled is at a distance of > 10 km from the village.
